title: Typophiles on Twitter
content:
I was just wishing we had the IM feature still and then it occurred to me that we could be using Twitter to fill that gap. Any takers?

[http://twitter.com/typegirl](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114110646/http:/twitter.com/typegirl "http://twitter.com/typegirl")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
Shore

[http://twitter.com/SharonVanLieu](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114110646/http:/twitter.com/SharonVanLieu "http://twitter.com/SharonVanLieu")

I haven't updated my profile yet.

Sharon

Hmm. I had forgotten that Joe started a thread: [http://typophile.com/node/36811](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114110646/http:/typophile.com/node/36811 "http://typophile.com/node/36811")

But still. Not that many people. Almost like crickets.

[http://twitter.com/weetypeman](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114110646/http:/twitter.com/weetypeman "http://twitter.com/weetypeman")

If anyone uses Skype, feel free to contact me

weegraphicsman
